com.pump.audio

Class StretchedAudioInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream
        • com.pump.audio.StretchedAudioInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class StretchedAudioInputStream
extends javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream
    This stretches an AudioInputStream so it plays back slower or faster than normal.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream

        format, frameLength, framePos, frameSize

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StretchedAudioInputStream create(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream input, double duration)
      Create a StretchedAudioInputStream that distorts the incoming audio so it matches a fixed duration.
      static StretchedAudioInputStream create(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream in, long frames)
      Create a StretchedAudioInputStream that distorts the incoming audio so it matches a fixed number of frames.

      • Methods inherited from class javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream

        available, close, getFormat, getFrameLength, mark, markSupported, read, read, read, reset, skip

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static StretchedAudioInputStream create(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream in,
                                               long frames)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Create a StretchedAudioInputStream that distorts the incoming audio so it matches a fixed number of frames.
        Parameters:
        in - the AudioInputStream to stretch.
        frames - the number of frames the input stream should be stretched to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • create

        public static StretchedAudioInputStream create(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream input,
                                               double duration)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Create a StretchedAudioInputStream that distorts the incoming audio so it matches a fixed duration.
        Parameters:
        input - the AudioInputStream to stretch.
        duration - the duration in seconds the AudioInputStream should be stretched to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.
